channel.title: Steve Jobs on Shrayas
channel.description: Recent content in Steve Jobs on Shrayas

item.title: iRreplaceable.
item.description: I’ve always had a secret dream. Something that iHavent shared with anyone. Something not even the closest of friends know. Thats because iThought there was still more time. But it so turns out that sometimes even though you think you have time , it is stolen right royally from your hands. This secret dream that iHave i’m going to share today. This dream is one that iHave had ever since iWas a kid.
